Posts.Content: I'm waiting to, it's a nightmare just not knowing what's in store. You sound an amazing bunch of people all here for each other all I can say is I'm keeping everything crossed for you and wishing for good news all round. Love and hugs p.s sleeping tablets and wine seem to work for me , not healthy I know but what good has being healthy done us eh? Xx
Posts.Title: Not coping/coping with the wait for results.
